file_insights.changes_summary: Added mobile-only info button next to theme toggle

patterns_discovered: Responsive design using Tailwind's breakpoint classes
Inline SVG icons for interactive buttons
Accessibility considerations with aria-label and title attributes
gotchas_discovered: Button currently lacks onClick handler for Evidence Legend Modal
SVG icon is hardcoded and may need dynamic styling
recommendations: Add onClick handler to trigger Evidence Legend Modal
Consider extracting SVG icon to a reusable component
Validate responsive behavior across different mobile breakpoints
